ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for LH Side)

atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the seatback frame and seat cushion frame may injure your hands.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT HEADREST ASSEMBLY
REMOVE RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw and release handle.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claw labeled A.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Pull the reclining cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw labeled B and remove the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT RECLINING COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claw labeled A.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Pull the reclining cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to detach the claw labeled B and remove the reclining cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEATBACK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 4 bolts and seatback.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEATBACK COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the hooks.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Open the zipper.
Roll up the seatback cover.
Detach the 4 claws and remove the 2 headrest supports.
Remove the seatback cover (with pad) from the seatback frame.
Remove the 2 hog rings and seatback cover from the seatback pad.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 lock release buttons and fully extend the reclining release handle.
Remove the 2 screws and lock cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK OUTER COVER RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 claws and remove the lock cover.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK INNER COVER RH
REMOVE SEAT TRACK LOWER RAIL PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the claws and remove the rail protector.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEAT TRACK LOWER RAIL PROTECTOR RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw.
Using a screwdriver, detach the claws and remove the rail protector.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 SEAT LEG LINK

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, remove the 2 E-rings. Then remove the 4 plates and leg link.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT HINGE ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 nuts and hinge.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT HINGE ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 nuts and hinge.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK CONTROL CABLE LH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, remove the E-ring and 2 washers.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the control cable as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Lift up the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat track to the foremost position.
Using a T40 "torx" socket, remove the 4 "torx" bolts.
Lift up the seat track adjusting handle and move the seat track to the rearmost position.
Using a screwdriver, push down the handle stopper and detach the claws. Then remove the seat track adjusting handle.
Using a T40 "torx" socket, remove the 2 "torx" bolts and seat cushion from the 2 seat tracks.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT CUSHION COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Open the fastening tape and remove the 3 hog rings.
Open the zippers and then remove the seat cushion cover (with pad).
Remove the 6 hog rings and seat cushion cover from the seat cushion pad.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 FOLD SEAT STOPPER BAND ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Pull the band in the direction indicated by the black arrow in the illustration. The remove the band.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the support spring as shown in the illustration.
Using a screwdriver, remove the E-ring and washer as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 nuts and lock.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT LOCK ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the support spring as shown in the illustration.
Using a T40 "torx" socket, remove the "torx" bolt and lock.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR PROTECTOR PIPE
